questionTitle: I don't know him but he looks as if he ________ be her brother.
She never says a word: she's as ________ as a mouse.
After his long absence from school he found it difficult to ________ up with the rest of his class.
We got to the theatre just ________ to see the first scene of the play.
The job of student lodgings officer ________ a great many visits to landladies.
Do you ________ my turning the television on now?
He was not very pleased about ________ called an incompetent idiot.
A hot lemon drink with honey is very good ________ a cold.
She heard a ________ at the door and went to see who was outside.
Out hotel is ________ walking distance of the sea.
The main ________ of this drink are wine, orange juice and bitters.
My hands smell ________ soap.
I'm sure he ________ on 15th January.
If I see Tom, I ________ to him.
If I get tickets for the cinema, I ________ you up.
She did all the work ________ her own.
The police finally arrested the ________ criminal.
The left wing of the party propers ________ the right wing seems to be losing ground.
During the lecture, the student took down ________ quantities of notes.
Open plains are ________ of the geography of Kenya.
